annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I am taking a look at a Tiki staple called the Navy Grog. This three rum tiki magic cocktail is a must have at all of your t...
annotations.title: Navy Grog | How to Drink

textContent:
- .75 oz or 21 ml Lime Juice
- .75 oz or 21 ml Grapefruit Juice
- .25 oz or 7 ml Demerara Syrup
- .25 oz or 7 ml Allspice Dram
- 1 oz or 30 ml Smith and Cross Rum (Navy strength Jamaican rum)
- 1 oz or 30 ml Appleton Estate (Jamaican rum)
- 1 oz or 30 ml English Harbour (Antigua rum)

Lightly shake with shaved ice
Open pour into rocks glass
Garnish with mint

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8YK04mhHiI8
title: Navy Grog
